example.eg: My name is Peter Smith.
example.egtrans: 我的名字叫彼得·史密斯。

example.eg: What's your name?
example.egtrans: 你叫什么名字？

example.eg: My professor's name is Smith.
example.egtrans: 我教授姓史密斯。

example.eg: Can you name all four members of the Beatles?
example.egtrans: 你能说出披头士乐队所有四个成员的名字吗？

example.eg: They are going to name the baby Michael.  Let's name the song "Furtive Mission".
example.egtrans: 他们要给孩子取名迈克。我们给那首歌取名叫“秘密任务”吧。

example.eg: The police report named three witnesses.
example.egtrans: 警方报告中提到了三位目击证人的名字。

example.eg: Colin wants a new name for his band.
example.egtrans: 柯林想给乐队起个新的名字。

example.eg: Jill is trying to make a name for herself.
example.egtrans: 吉尔正努力为自己打造名气。

example.eg: The organizers want a big name to host the banquet.
Johnson was chairman in name only.
example.egtrans: 约翰逊只是名义上的董事长。

example.eg: He married her for her good name and contacts.
example.egtrans: 他之所以娶她，是因为她的良好名声以及人脉。

example.eg: Jen likes to wear clothes from a name brand.
The cinema usher wore his name tag with pride.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 写有名字的, 姓名的

example.eg: The writer named Twain as his inspiration.
Just name your price, and I'll pay it.
The council named a successor.
The police have named a suspect in the case.
Many butterfly species bear the name of their discoverers.
Her birth name was Georgiana, but everyone just called her Georgie.
Does anyone have any better ideas for a new brand name?
example.egtrans: 关于品牌名称，谁还有更好的点子么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 商标名称, 品牌名称

dsense.name: call [sb] every name under the sun

example.eg: You can call me every name under the sun, but it doesn't change the situation one bit.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用尽各种污言秽语辱骂某人

example.eg: Enter your Christian name in the first box and your surname in the second.
You'll have to sue that slanderer in court in order to clear your name.
"Deep Throat" was the code name of one of the Watergate informants.
example.egtrans: “深喉”是水门事件告密者的代号。

example.eg: They code-named it "Operation White Swan".
He's the last surviving male so it's his task to carry on the family name.
example.egtrans: 他是最后一名幸存的男性，所以他的任务就是将他们家的姓氏延续下去。

example.eg: In the US "Michael" is a popular first name for boys.  Most forms ask you to complete your surname followed by your first name.
example.egtrans: 在美国，“迈克尔”是很受欢迎的男孩名。多数的表格都要求你在名后面写上你的姓氏。

example.eg: In Danish schools, it is common for children to first-name their teachers.
example.egtrans: 在丹麦的学校，学生用名称呼自己的老师，这一现象十分常见。

example.eg: You must always give your full name when filling out government forms.  Please state your full name to the judge.
example.egtrans: 在填写政府表单时，你必须使用全名。请告诉法官你的全名。

example.eg: Hispanic cultures use the mother's last name as part of the child's full name.
example.egtrans: 西班牙的文化会把母亲的姓氏作为孩子姓名的一部分。

example.eg: Your behaviour is giving me a bad name in the neighbourhood!

dsense.name: give a dog a bad name and hang him

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有事说事，别拿狗撒气, 欲加之罪，何患无辞

example.eg: Mrs. Johnson's given name is Edith.
example.egtrans: 约翰逊太太的名是伊迪丝。

example.eg: Mr. Wilson's given names are Howard and Nicholas.
example.egtrans: 威尔逊先生的名和

example.eg: The criminal goes by the nickname of 'The Black Cat'.
example.egtrans: 这名罪犯的绰号叫做“黑猫”。

example.eg: Although they were never proven, the allegations tarnished his good name.
All of these famous actresses are household names.
Some products promoted as green are green in name only.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 挂名的，名义上的, 表面上的

example.eg: The Royal Family's last name is Windsor.
example.egtrans: 皇室的姓氏是温莎。

example.eg: These days, a lot of women keep their maiden name after getting married.
example.egtrans: 最近，许多女性婚后也会留着自己的娘家姓。

dsense.name: make a big name for yourself

example.eg: After his book was published he made a big name for himself in literary circles.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使你成名, 让你声名远扬

dsense.name: married name
dsense.guideword: (woman's surname after marriage) (有些国家女子婚后随夫姓)

example.eg: Women may be known by their married names or their maiden names.

dsense.name: middle name
dsense.guideword: (second or additional given name) (名与姓中间的名)

example.eg: I never use my middle name.  His first name was Michael, but everyone called him by his middle name, John.
example.egtrans: 我从不使用自己的中名。他的名是迈克尔，但是所有人都用他的中名约翰来称呼他。

dsense.name: my name is
dsense.guideword: (I am called, I am known as)

example.eg: My name is Joe.
example.egtrans: 我的名字是乔。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我的名字叫…，我的名字是…

example.eg: We'd like to name the baby after my mother if it's a girl.
example.egtrans: 如果是个女孩，我们想以我母亲的名字命名她。

example.eg: Please give me your name and address and I will add you to the mailing list.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 命名日, 圣徒纪念日

dsense.name: name of the game
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (aim, purpose) (非正式用语，比喻)

example.eg: For most students, getting good grades is the name of the game.
They had to sew name tags into all their clothes.
The staff all wore name tags.

dsense.name: organization name, also UK: organisation name

trans_examp.trans_cn: 组织名字, 组织名称, 机构名称

example.eg: Writer Samuel Clemens used the pen name Mark Twain.
Gillian's pet name for her husband is "Sweet Pea."
The study of place names is called toponymy.
Her full name is Diana Lynn, but her preferred name is Lynn.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 喜欢用的名字, 偏好名, 印刷体姓名

example.eg: Please use your proper legal name when filling out this form.
In English, common nouns usually begin with a lower-case letter and proper nouns with a capital.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 专有名词, 特有名词, 固有名词

example.eg: Scotch Tape and Sellotape are both proprietary names for adhesive tape.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 专利名称, 专有商品名

dsense.name: scientific name
dsense.guideword: (Latin term for [sth]) (指某物的拉丁学名)

example.eg: The scientific name for the blackbird is Turdus merula.
Paul's second name is Ian.
A lot of actors adopt stage names that are shorter than their real names.
The street names in my area are all named after famous English poets.
Pot, weed and grass are commonly used street names for marijuana.
What lakes are in Minnesota? To name but a few, Red Lake, Gull Lake, and Lake Minnetonka.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 举几个例子, 仅举几例

example.eg: Prescription drugs have both trade names and generic names.
I typed in my user name and password to log in.
I forgot my username and password again!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无名氏女子, 不知道名字的女性

dsense.name: what's-his-name, whatshisname
dsense.guideword: slang (man: forgotten name) (记不起名字时)

example.eg: I ran into what's-his-name again this afternoon.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 那个某某，你叫他什么来着

example.eg: The restaurant has sandwiches, pizza, salad, steak, you name it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 凡是你能说出的物品, 凡是你想要的东西
